calculations.name: Selected Product
calculations.tableau_expression:
IF [Parameters].[Selected Product] = [Product Grouping] THEN [Product Grouping] 
ELSEIF [Parameters].[Selected Product] = 'ALL' THEN 'ALL'
ELSE 'NOT SELECTED' END

calculation_context.Expression:
IF [Parameters].[Selected Product] = [Product Grouping] THEN [Product Grouping] 
ELSEIF [Parameters].[Selected Product] = 'ALL' THEN 'ALL'
ELSE 'NOT SELECTED' END

calculated_fields.Product Grouping:
CASE [Product]
WHEN 'Bank account or service' THEN 'BANK SERVICES'
WHEN 'Checking or savings account' THEN 'CHECKING / SAVINGS'
WHEN 'Credit card' THEN 'CREDIT CARD'
WHEN 'Mortgage' THEN 'MORTGAGE'
ELSE 'OTHER' END
